StockIssuedDuringPeriodValueShareBasedCo.description: Value, after forfeiture, of shares issued under share-based payment arrangement. Excludes employee stock ownership plan (ESOP).

StockIssuedDuringPeriodValueStockOptions.label: Stock Issued During Period, Value, Stock Options Exercised
StockIssuedDuringPeriodValueStockOptions.description: Value of stock issued as a result of the exercise of stock options.

TreasuryStockShares.label: Treasury Stock, Shares
TreasuryStockShares.description: Number of common and preferred shares that were previously issued and that were repurchased by the issuing entity and held in treasury on the financial statement date. This stock has no voting rights and receives no dividends.

TreasuryStockValue.label: Treasury Stock, Value
TreasuryStockValue.description: The amount allocated to treasury stock. Treasury stock is common and preferred shares of an entity that were issued, repurchased by the entity, and are held in its treasury.

UnrecognizedTaxBenefitsDecreasesResultin.label: Unrecognized Tax Benefits, Decrease Resulting from Prior Period Tax Positions
UnrecognizedTaxBenefitsDecreasesResultin.description: Amount of decrease in unrecognized tax benefits resulting from tax positions taken in prior period tax returns.

UnrecognizedTaxBenefitsIncomeTaxPenaltie.label: Unrecognized Tax Benefits, Income Tax Penalties and Interest Accrued
UnrecognizedTaxBenefitsIncomeTaxPenaltie.description: Amount accrued for interest on an underpayment of income taxes and penalties related to a tax position claimed or expected to be claimed in the tax return.

UnrecognizedTaxBenefitsIncomeTaxPenaltie.label: Unrecognized Tax Benefits, Income Tax Penalties and Interest Expense
UnrecognizedTaxBenefitsIncomeTaxPenaltie.description: Amount of expense for interest on an underpayment of income taxes and penalties related to a tax position claimed or expected to be claimed in the tax return.

UnrecognizedTaxBenefitsIncreasesResultin.label: Unrecognized Tax Benefits, Increase Resulting from Current Period Tax Positions
UnrecognizedTaxBenefitsIncreasesResultin.description: Amount of increase in unrecognized tax benefits resulting from tax positions that have been or will be taken in current period tax return.

UnrecognizedTaxBenefitsIncreasesResultin.label: Unrecognized Tax Benefits, Increase Resulting from Prior Period Tax Positions
UnrecognizedTaxBenefitsIncreasesResultin.description: Amount of increase in unrecognized tax benefits resulting from tax positions taken in prior period tax returns.

UnrecognizedTaxBenefitsReductionsResulti.label: Unrecognized Tax Benefits, Reduction Resulting from Lapse of Applicable Statute of Limitations
UnrecognizedTaxBenefitsReductionsResulti.description: Amount of decrease in unrecognized tax benefits resulting from lapses of applicable statutes of limitations.

UnrecognizedTaxBenefitsThatWouldImpactEf.label: Unrecognized Tax Benefits that Would Impact Effective Tax Rate
UnrecognizedTaxBenefitsThatWouldImpactEf.description: The total amount of unrecognized tax benefits that, if recognized, would affect the effective tax rate.

ValuationAllowanceDeferredTaxAssetChange.label: Valuation Allowance, Deferred Tax Asset, Increase (Decrease), Amount
ValuationAllowanceDeferredTaxAssetChange.description: Amount of increase (decrease) in the valuation allowance for a specified deferred tax asset.

WeightedAverageNumberDilutedSharesOutsta.label: Weighted Average Number Diluted Shares Outstanding Adjustment
WeightedAverageNumberDilutedSharesOutsta.description: The sum of dilutive potential common shares or units used in the calculation of the diluted per-share or per-unit computation.

WeightedAverageNumberOfDilutedSharesOuts.label: Weighted Average Number of Shares Outstanding, Diluted
WeightedAverageNumberOfDilutedSharesOuts.description: The average number of shares or units issued and outstanding that are used in calculating diluted EPS or earnings per unit (EPU), determined based on the timing of issuance of shares or units in the period.

WeightedAverageNumberOfShareOutstandingB.label: Weighted Average Number of Shares Outstanding, Basic and Diluted
WeightedAverageNumberOfShareOutstandingB.description: Average number of shares or units issued and outstanding that are used in calculating basic and diluted earnings per share (EPS).

WeightedAverageNumberOfSharesOutstanding.label: Weighted Average Number of Shares Outstanding, Basic
WeightedAverageNumberOfSharesOutstanding.description: Number of [basic] shares or units, after adjustment for contingently issuable shares or units and other shares or units not deemed outstanding, determined by relating the portion of time within a reporting period that common shares or units have been outstanding to the total time in that period.

CashCashEquivalentsRestrictedCashAndRest.label: Cash, Cash Equivalents, Restricted Cash and Restricted Cash Equivalents
CashCashEquivalentsRestrictedCashAndRest.description: Amount of cash and cash equivalents, and cash and cash equivalents restricted to withdrawal or usage. Excludes amount for disposal group and discontinued operations. Cash includes, but is not limited to, currency on hand, demand deposits with banks or financial institutions, and other accounts with general characteristics of demand deposits. Cash equivalents include, but are not limited to, short-term, highly liquid investments that are both readily convertible to known amounts of cash and so near their maturity that they present insignificant risk of changes in value because of changes in interest rates.

AvailableForSaleDebtSecuritiesAmortizedC.label: Debt Securities, Available-for-sale, Amortized Cost
AvailableForSaleDebtSecuritiesAmortizedC.description: Amortized cost of investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale).

AvailableForSaleDebtSecuritiesGrossUnrea.label: Debt Securities, Available-for-sale, Unrealized Gain
AvailableForSaleDebtSecuritiesGrossUnrea.description: Amount of unrealized gain on investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale).

AvailableForSaleDebtSecuritiesGrossUnrea.label: Debt Securities, Available-for-sale, Unrealized Loss
AvailableForSaleDebtSecuritiesGrossUnrea.description: Amount of unrealized loss on investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale).

AvailableForSaleSecuritiesDebtSecurities.label: Debt Securities, Available-for-sale, Current
AvailableForSaleSecuritiesDebtSecurities.description: Amount of investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale), classified as current.

ContractWithCustomerLiabilityCurrent.label: Contract with Customer, Liability, Current
ContractWithCustomerLiabilityCurrent.description: Amount of obligation to transfer good or service to customer for which consideration has been received or is receivable, classified as current.

DebtSecuritiesTradingRealizedGain.label: Debt Securities, Trading, Realized Gain
DebtSecuritiesTradingRealizedGain.description: Amount of realized gain on investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in net income (trading).

DebtSecuritiesTradingRealizedLoss.label: Debt Securities, Trading, Realized Loss
DebtSecuritiesTradingRealizedLoss.description: Amount of realized loss on investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in net income (trading).

GainLossOnDispositionOfAssets1.label: Gain (Loss) on Disposition of Assets
GainLossOnDispositionOfAssets1.description: Amount of gain (loss) on sale or disposal of assets, including but not limited to property plant and equipment, intangible assets and equity in securities of subsidiaries or equity method investee.

ImpairmentOfInvestments.label: Other than Temporary Impairment Losses, Investments
ImpairmentOfInvestments.description: The amount by which the fair value of an investment is less than the amortized cost basis or carrying amount of that investment at the balance sheet date and the decline in fair value is deemed to be other than temporary, before considering whether or not such amount is recognized in earnings or other comprehensive income.

IncreaseDecreaseInOtherCurrentLiabilitie.label: Increase (Decrease) in Other Current Liabilities
IncreaseDecreaseInOtherCurrentLiabilitie.description: Amount of increase (decrease) in current liabilities classified as other.

ProductWarrantyAccrual.label: Standard and Extended Product Warranty Accrual
ProductWarrantyAccrual.description: Carrying value as of the balance sheet date of obligations incurred through that date and payable for estimated claims under standard and extended warranty protection rights granted to customers.

DebtSecuritiesRealizedGainLoss.label: Debt Securities, Realized Gain (Loss)
DebtSecuritiesRealizedGainLoss.description: Amount of realized gain (loss) on investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale), investment in debt security measured at amortized cost (held-to-maturity) and investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in net income (trading).

IncreaseDecreaseInContractWithCustomerLi.label: Increase (Decrease) in Contract with Customer, Liability
IncreaseDecreaseInContractWithCustomerLi.description: Amount of increase (decrease) in obligation to transfer good or service to customer for which consideration has been received or is receivable.

ProceedsFromDividendsReceived.label: Proceeds from Dividends Received
ProceedsFromDividendsReceived.description: Dividends received on equity and other investments during the current period.

RelatedPartyTransactionPurchasesFromRela.label: Related Party Transaction, Purchases from Related Party
RelatedPartyTransactionPurchasesFromRela.description: Purchases during the period (excluding transactions that are eliminated in consolidated or combined financial statements) with related party.

DividendsCommonStockCash.label: Dividends, Common Stock, Cash
DividendsCommonStockCash.description: Amount of paid and unpaid common stock dividends declared with the form of settlement in cash.
